job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <p><strong><u>Sr. Software Engineer Job Description<br><br></u></strong></p><p>The Sr. Software Engineer position is accountable to deliver highest quality software for UHG/Optum next generation web-based Provider portals, applications, and solutions. As an integral member of the technology delivery team, the Sr. Software Engineer will be a primary contributor in designing, coding, testing, debugging, documenting and supporting software applications consistent with established specifications and business requirements to deliver business value. The ideal candidate has 4+ years full-stack software engineering experience and proficiency in Microservices Architecture.<br><br></p><p> <br><br></p><p><strong><u>Required Skills:<br><br></u></strong></p><p>· 4+ years of experience with Java (Must have Java 8 or higher)<br><br></p><p>· 2+ years of Experience in Spring Boot or Spring MVC<br><br></p><p>· 2+ years of Experience in Developing Rest Services<br><br></p><p>· 2+ years of experience with Git<br><br></p><p>· 2+years of experience in Kafka<br><br></p><p>· 1+ years of experience with Dependency Injection framework<br><br></p><p>· 3+ years of experience in Microservices<br><br></p><p>· 5+ years of software development experience.<br><br></p><p>· 3+ years of experience with agile development methodologies.<br><br></p><p>· 1+ years of experience with Test-Driven Development using automated testing frameworks<br><br></p><p>· 3+ years of experience ensuring your code builds and deploys properly through Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment processes built in Jenkins.<br><br></p><p>· <br><br></p><p> <br><br></p><br>Hadoop,Security,spring,Docker,management,architecture,Debugging,Agile,Scrum,ant,Design,Automation,Azure,Adaptability,Engineering,Shipping,Testing, Communication, SAN, Kubernetes, Business,Java,Data Structures,React
